body.name: Muitune Bluetooth Headphones 120 Hours Extra Long Playback with Microphone Headset, i35 Balanced Armature Drivers Stereo in Ear Wireless Earbuds, Waterproof Workout Neckband Headphones (Teal)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 13 hrs 50 mins
features: Extra Long Battery Life -- With a built-in 1,000mAh lithium polymer battery, Muitune i35-JPO earbuds feature 120 hours of playback time at 80% volume. With Type-C charging port, it can be fully charged to three hours, or charge it from empty power for ten minutes to achieve 10 hours playback

Pleasant Vivid Sound -- Hybrid designed features a single custom tuned balanced armature driver for each earbud and 10mm neodymium diaphragm delivers powerful bass vividly and stereo. Aluminum alloy cavity effectively avoids interfere with external signal to output stable audio

Ergonomic Design -- The i35-JPO bluetooth in-ear headphones optimized the angle at which the earbuds enter the ear canal, the lightweight earbud itself weigh less than 5 grams, they can fit almost all pinna shapes and three sizes of L,M,S soft caps allow you to comfortably wear for long time

Bluetooth 5.3 Connection -- Utilize the advanced Bluetooth 5.3 chipset. Muitune i35-JPO supports HFP1.7/ HSP1.2/ A2DP1.3/ AVRCP1.6/ SPP1.2, which greatly improve the transmission speed and providing you with a low latency listening experience. Quick pairing in less than one second

Easy to Use -- The i35-JPO blue tooth earphones are compatible with all bluetooth enabled devices, like android phones, ios devices, laptops, mp3 and so on. It has a built in microphone for clear phone calls, and it is also compatible with Siri and Android voice assistant
body.description: Support Voice Asssistant Android and iOS Quick press the power button twice to active Google Voice Assistant or 'Siri', then you can give voice command to your Android phones or iPhones. There is a built-in microphone of the same quality as a mobile phone microphone, which is convenient for making calls, and is also very suitable for the more frequent network conference needs now.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultra Long Battery Life The Muitune i35 wireless headphones utilizes 1,000 mAh lithium polymer battery to achieve 120 hours playback record at 80% volume. This outstanding feature makes it almost indistinguishable from wired headphones, and it is more convenient than other Bluetooth headphones without frequent charging. It can charging from 0% battery for 10 minutes through its USB C port to get 10 hours playback, TYPE C charging cable included.

Customized Drivers The Muitune i35 Balanced Armature Drivers are tuned several times to improve treble quality, detailed midrange and ensures a better frequency response across the entire audible range . The BA Drivers use less energy to generate loud sounds, which reduces power consumption or battery life. On the other hand, the BA Drivers have a more complex structure, which raises their production cost and as a result, the cost of headphones.

Magnetic Function The ends of the two earbuds are magnetically held together to prevent the cable from getting tangled. Ergonomic Design The shape of i35 perfectly fits the curve of inner contour of ear. With round soft silicone eartips, it can offer more wearing stability and comfort when in use. Lightweight Earbuds The earbuds themselves are super lightweight, tiny compact body, they are less than 2g (0.07oz) for each. Listening to songs for a long time will not be tired.

Instant Pairing Press the power button for one second to turn on the headphones. Enable smartphone's bluetooth function and choose to connect 'i35'. Bluetooth 5.3 Chipset Advanced connection technology support HFP1.7/ HSP1.2/ A2DP1.3/ AVRCP1.6/ SPP1.2 protocols. Greatly improves the transmission speed and low-latency listening experience. Cable Length Adjustable There are two rings at each side to adjust earbuds cable length to better fit your needs.

Easy to Operate: There are four buttons on the right side band, in line control play/pause/phone call/volume/last and next music. * The first button is power button, press 1 second to turn it on, press 3 seconds to turn it off * The second button is play/pause music or take phone calls * Press the '+' button to play the last song, long press '+' to increase volume * Press the '-' button to play the next song, long press '-' to decrease volume Support Voice Asssistant Android and iOS Quick press the power button twice to active Google Voice Assistant or 'Siri', then you can give voice command to your Android phones or iPhones. There is a built-in microphone of the same quality as a mobile phone microphone, which is convenient for making calls, and is also very suitable for the more frequent network conference needs now.

FAQ: Q: The product description says 120 hours playback, are you sure it's not standby time? A: Yes, it's pretty sure it can continuously play music up to 120 hours at 80% volume, it means if you listen to it up to 8 hours a day, it will last half a month with a single charge. Q: How long does it take for this pair of headphones to play at its best? A: It probably takes more than 10 hours to get to its best, during which time we recommend playing some rock, country or symphony. Q: How to check the charging status of the earbuds wireless bluetooth? A: When charging, the indicator is red. After fully charged, the indicator turns blue. Q: How to check the bluetooth headphones remaining battery? A: You can ckeck it when it connected with your smartphones. When the battery is low, the indicator will turn red with voice prompt. Q: Is it fit for motorcycle? A: Yes, it is perfect for motorcycles, the neckband headphones will be firmly placed around your neck, and the earbuds have 3 sizes of eartips to fit in different ear canals will not fall out. Q: Are they held together magnetically? A: Yes, you can magnetically stick the two earphones together when not in use to prevent tangled. Q: Can these be used to make phone calls? A: Yes, it has a built in microphone, it can be used to answer and hang-up a phone call and conversations by using the function button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, reasonably priced & decent sounding earbuds for jogging needs!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I wanted such earbuds for use while jogging outdoors. These earbuds do the job very well. Not the best-sounding ones for music experience but good enough for needs. Overall it has a decent capability & we (My wife & I) are satisfied with it for the price factor. I would recommend it.My 2 cents below:Pros:- Sound is decent & clear enough- The microphone works great in calls & no one has complained yet who listens to me on those calls- Comfortable to wear & use even for long periods- The controls on the headphones are easy to get used to- Design is classy & professional- Build quality is very good overall & feels durable- Reasonably priced when compared to the competitive options availableCons:- It is not the best-sounding headphones for music listening experiences and it's not fair to compare it with those high-end headphones too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extra-long battery life, comfortable fit, clear audio
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These earbuds, with their impressive 120-hour battery life, keep me company from the moment I wake up until I'm ready to call it a night. The extended playback time means I never have to worry about running out of juice, making them perfect for my busy middle school schedule.I like the way they snugly fit into my ears, creating a cozy cocoon of sound. The balanced armature drivers deliver a rich and clear audio experience, whether I'm listening to my favorite tunes or catching up on podcasts. I can wear them during intense workouts, and even when I'm caught in unexpected rain, they continue to perform flawlessly. The neckband ensures they stay securely around my neck, preventing them from getting lost or tangled.I just learned the importance of a good set of earbuds when I started using these. They help me stay focused during homework sessions and make my walks to school much more enjoyable. The durability of these earbuds is impressive, surviving accidental drops and daily wear and tear. Plus, the simple controls make it easy for me to adjust the volume or change tracks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly good for price!
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- Cheap- Lightweight/comfortable. Barely notice they are on your collar after a few uses.- Super-long battery. The 80-100 hours claim is not an exaggeration, I play rock and hip-hop at near full volume, and have reached at least 60 hrs on a full charge.- Although not especially rugged, I've dropped them a few times without damage.- default bud tips are not bad in terms of fit, a little fatigue after long usage. I replaced mine with better isolation tips after a few weeks.Cons:- Sound quality is not great, even with a phone EQ app, I struggle to get true quality. However, as a former audio engineer, I'm a bit snobbish in this department. For the price, it's decent quality.- Button ergonomics not great, especially when using light-weight gloves.- magnets could be a bit stronger, they barely hold together.This is my first foray into collar style headsets. I work in an industrial environment, and I hate using my high-end buds, they just get ruined or lost, and I hate having to charge every day. These are a great, cheap bluetooth set that I can quickly pop in and out, not worry about where I put them or have to hold on to them, the battery lasts for weeks, and cheap enough to replace when I do something stupid to them. Quality and isolation is marginal, but fine for a loud work shop. Buttons could be better, but usable with some focus. Calls seem to be ok for send and receive.Great cheap set with long battery life, and mostly hands free, for work environments. Inexpensive enough not to be a problem if they get damaged in a rough work environment.*** 6 month Update: Still have them, still use them almost daily at a wood shop, or when I'm out shoveling snow, or long walks. Still maintain above review.Love them for the long battery life, and exceptional price value. A must have for anyone looking for a cost-effective long-life bluetooth bud set, particularly in a light-medium noise level work environment. The metallic red makes them easy to find in sawdust when I do something stupid. I've gone through maybe 20 different models of cheap bluetooth sets...wired, tethered, and buds....these are the most practical and longest surviving of them all so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long Lasting Bluetooth Earbuds
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased these headphones mainly for use at the gym. Ive battled countless pairs of bluetooth earbuds and usually they break or the battery life sucks. These earbuds promised 120 hours of playback. Of course I was skeptical but intrigued at the same time.So as it turns out these earbuds are battery life champions. A single charge takes me through a week of commutes, and gym sessions with juice still to spare. The 10 minute charge for 10 hour playback feature is a lifesaver for those inevitable almost dead moments. Its such a relief not to worry about daily charging.In terms of sound the i35s deliver a clear balanced sound across all different music genres. The custom tuned balanced armature drivers and 10mm neodymium diaphragms punch out clean highs, rich mids, and decently powerful bass. I have not been disappointed so far when using them regardless of the audio played.These earbuds have a durable build. The are lightweight and have a ergonomic design that kinda disappears in your ear.There are multiple ear tip sizes included so I was able to adjust them to ensure a snug, secure fit. I have never experienced any discomfort after wearing them even for long periods of time.I am happy with my purchase overall. These earbuds deliver long lasting and high quality audio. The 120 hour battery life alone makes them a good value for the money!

Definitivamente, no me arrepiento de haber adquirido estos audífonos:Con toda facilidad, una carga de energía me dura toda una semana, pesar de que los uso mucho,Tienen una cobertura de hasta 15 metros, sin que su sonido se degrade se interrumpa,Muy buena calidad de sonido,Muy cómodos.En resumen, excelente relación costo beneficio.Confieso que cuando finqué el pedido, lo hice con algo de temor, debido a que el producto exhibía un mensaje que decía que, debido a que era un producto de importación, existía el riesgo de que no fuese como se describía en la página; sin embargo, lo que recibí, fue tal como lo ofertado aquí.
Hasta el momento han funcionado muy bien. Cuando estás en llamada no hay interferencia.

reviews.reviewTitle: La duración de la batería es excelente
reviews.reviewText: Cumple perfectamente con lo que promete. La deadema es muy blanda y se desacomodan fácil mente, un poco más de firmeza ayudaría a mantenerla en su lugar
